channel.title: election on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in election on FinanClub

item.title: Ecuador President Lasso Declines to Run in Election
item.description: Ecuadorian President Guillermo Lasso has announced that he will not seek re-election in 2025. Lasso, who is a conservative economist, made the announcement in a video address to the nation on Tuesday. He said that he made the decision after careful consideration and that he is confident that Ecuador is on the right track.

item.title: Why Turkey's President Faces the Biggest Election Challenge in Years
item.description: Turkey’s Presidential Election: Erdogan Faces His Biggest Challenge in Years Incumbent Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan faces his biggest challenge in 20 years in Sunday’s runoff election against opposition candidate Kemal Kilicdaroglu. WSJ’s Jared Malsin explains why this is one of the world’s most important votes.
